title: Charm of Myths
summaries: The Charm of Myths is a Hardmode accessory which combines the effects of Band of Regeneration and Philosopher's Stone. When equipped, it regenerates 1 / 0.5 health every second and decreases the Potion Sickness debuff duration by 25%. Therefore, 45 seconds after consuming a recovery potion while the Charm of Myths is equipped, another one can be consumed.

statistics.Tooltip: Provides life regeneration and reduces the cooldown of healing potions by 25%
